text: Lu I-feng (; born 25 November 1962) is a Taiwanese politician. Lu attended the Lan Yang Institute of Technology. He was affiliated with the Kuomintang, and sat on the Legislative Yuan between 1999 and 2002, representing Yilan. ==References== Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:Kuomintang Members of the Legislative Yuan in Taiwan Category:Members of the 4th Legislative Yuan Category:Yilan County Members of the Legislative Yuan Category:People from Toucheng, Yilan County, Taiwan
title: Lu I-feng
